#### Kobe Plots

<br>

* tracks stock status through time
* red box represents a stock that is overfished and experiencing overfishing
* yellow boxes represent either overfishing occurring, but not overfished or overfished, but overfishing not occurring
* green box represents a stock neither overfished or experiencing overfishing
* each HCR is a different colored line that moves between the colored boxes based on stock status through time
* overfishing status based on the ratio of F to F<sub>MSY</sub>
* overfished status based on the ratio of SSB to SSB<sub>MSY</sub>
